Pubbaṇakeneva siddhepi ltvādinivattiyā so vidheyyova, no ce ltvādayopi siyunti codakappasaṅgamāsaṅkiyāha- ‘naceva’miccādi. Avagamābhāvameva phuṭayitumāha- ‘nahiṃ’ccādi. Hi yasmātyatthe yo eso vajati so kattā, yo eso vajati so vikkhipotyayamattho-tra gamyate, na pana tehi tādatthiyaṃ gamyateti attho.
